channel.title: Marketing on Strait Talk
channel.description: Recent content in Marketing on Strait Talk

item.title: Edlyn Khoo
item.description:
• Who are you and what do you do?

    Umm, the first question seems to be the hardest one of all! I am a dreamer, a romantic and an idealist who believes that people are inherently good. Words, music, autumn leaves and antiquity (old buildings, artifacts, places of history) are what gives me the fuzzies.

    As to what I do… by profession, Iâ€™m a marketing professional. In other words, I try to make people buy stuff by helping them see why they need it. I also freelance as a copywriter, and I sing in a choir too.
